AI Description: Augur is a bioinformatics tool designed for phylogenetic analysis of viral genomes. It provides a pipeline for analyzing viral sequence data, performing phylogenetic inference, and visualizing the results.
Core Features: Phylogenetic Analysis Of Viral Genomes, Pipeline For Viral Sequence Data Analysis, Phylogenetic Inference, Visualization Of Results
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Phylogenetics, Viral Genomes, Sequence Analysis
